article: My name  _  Lily. I'm in China now. I'm twelve. I'm a new student in Class 4,  Grade Seven  , No.6 Middle School. My music teacher is Miss Li. She is  _  , but I'm  _  American girl. I have a sister.  _  name is Lucy. We are twins. I'm very tall and slim. I like listening to music, and I'm good  _  singing. My sister is  _  the school volleyball team. She  plays  volleyball very well, but she  _  love singing. We have a cat. Her name is Mimi. We love  _  very much.
